replies.body:
HAI FALZ!

Opinion?
You are a real swanky dude, and it's been great fun talking with you. Your snaps are cool, and your voice sounds just as good as xCand's. You are a real nice guy, and i do hope to work with you in the staff team. But sometimes I'm not sure whether you are bullying me or not :v. Oh and CONGRATS on mod!

How many poofies does it take to fill a room?
4

Who's the best poofy?
Well which one? Poofywoo, Poofywou, Poofywu, or Poofyweu?

replies.body:
Opinions?
You are one of the nicest mods, i've known!. You are an amazing pvper, and every time i see you, I'm extremely scared to fight. Before, my interview, you were very supportive towards me giving me helpful advice, in which I'm very thankful for. You are a cool dude, my dude.

Fav Pizza Toppings?
I do like the odd meat lovers.

Thanks! gl on your trial to senior :D

replies.body:
DIABOLC FORCEDEEEEEEEEEE

opinion
diabolic force , you are my main man when making maps xdddd (I'm done with that). You seem real friendly and calm, I've never heard you speak, but you seem like a cool boy. I was really happy you got mod, because you seem like one of the best.

i was like yay, and then OH SH**. TBH I just wanted to be in Magnace's montage xddd. But that was real scary, I panicked

Poofywoo or thesus101?
Well it's called joining New Dawn as Poofywoo and too lazy to get reknown as Thesus. I like poofy better though.

replies.body:
Micah!

You seem real chill, and always positive! You where there during my first interview, and I was really grateful for the support. TBH afterwards I really wanted you to be my mentor xd. I hope we get to work more in the future!

opinionz
THE COOLEST MOST AWESOMEST PERSON ON THE ENTIRE WORLD. A good mod that's super friendly, and I look up to you as a junior. Good at pvp too.

how many poofys are there
There are currently 4 poofies.
poofywoo, poofywu, poofyweu and poofywou. The criteria is strict. Gotta live in nz bro to pass the first test

why r u so toxic ;)
Oh, 
The taste of your lips
I'm on a ride
You're toxic I'm slippin' under
With a taste of a poison paradise
I'm addicted to you
Don't you know that you're toxic?
And I love what you do
Don't you know that you're toxic?

twas Thesus, but I poofy is the best

idk how tall aren't I?

Blue eh, I look fashionable in all COLOURS

whats your favorite cereal
Nutrigrain

pretty snazzy. Aside from the fact that my friends made me drink hot sauce

replies.body:
Accepted you are a really nice guy that's fun to talk to and mess around with. 

Well, I was really surprised you were demoted especially for the reason. I'm not sure if I was junior then, but I didn't actually get to view the evidence, I just heard about what happened from you and some other players. I don't really have an opinion if you should or shouldn't have been demoted, because you had done so much in the staff team.

i am really glad you were reassessed because you are a good mod.
